hero.title: Sum Diary
hero.subtitle: A smart diary service where AI analyzes and understands your emotions. Record your daily feelings and discover your own emotional patterns.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to record and understand emotions

analysis.title: AI Emotion Analysis
analysis.description: GPT-based AI analyzes diary content to understand and empathize with your emotions.

visualization.title: Emotion Pattern Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize the flow of emotions over time to discover patterns.

interpretation.title: Personalized Interpretation
interpretation.description: AI provides empathetic interpretations and advice tailored to your emotions.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy
privacy.description: All diaries are encrypted and stored, accessible only by you.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Write and analyze diaries in Korean, English, and Japanese.

themes.title: Beautiful Themes
themes.description: Choose between the paper-textured Paper theme and the clean Minimal theme.

cta.title: Record Your Emotions Today
cta.description: Start for free and understand your emotions with AI.
